article.headline: Portland State 93, Montana 92 (OT)
article.story: PORTLAND, Ore. (AP) -- Juma Kamara and Anthony Washington each scored 18 points and Portland State withstood rallies at the end of regulation and in overtime to beat Montana 93-92 Saturday afternoon. Montana (20-6, 9-4 Big Sky) battled back from a 70-54 deficit with 3:17 remaining and tied the score at 78 when Virgil Matthews hit a 3-pointer with 30 seconds left in regulation. Matthews scored 11 of his 19 points during the run. Jake Schroeder missed two free throws with 21 seconds to play, giving Montana the final possession, but the Grizzlies failed to get a shot off. Portland State (12-15, 5-9) opened the overtime with an 8-1 run, but two 3-pointers by Kevin Criswell kept the Grizzlies in the game. A 3-pointer by Stuart Mayes got Montana within 93-92 with 12 seconds left. Portland State's Tyrell Mara, who played just two minutes, missed two free throws with nine seconds remaining. However, Mayes's jumper with two seconds left was off the mark. Schroeder added 17 points for the Vikings, followed by Josh Neeley with 16 and Ryan Sommer with 15 points and seven assists. Criswell also had 19 points for the Grizzlies, followed by Andrew Strait with 18 and Kyle Sharp with 13. Montana led 33-30 at halftime on a dunk by Strait. Portland State used a 17-4 run, capped by Washington's three-point play, to take a 63-50 lead with 6:57 remaining.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
